title: What Is This Font? \*\*\*HELP PLEASE\*\*\*
content:
This font looks so familiar, but I can’t figure it out. I need an ’A’ that looks like it would belong to this font. It doesn’t have to be exactly correct, it just has to look similar. (If you know where I can get some cool curly cues to go along with it, that would be great too :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2360_front_crop_6616.jpg)

 [‹ Need help with this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43792 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help Please. And thank you. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43807 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jacksavvy

comments.content:
I also am looking for this font (in brown):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2360_front_crop2_3523.jpg)

Hi Jack. Check out the Didone section of [this list](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-bold-ultra-black-fonts/#didone).

Your second face is [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003055/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/emigre/mrs_eaves_bold/?sample_text=GABRIELLA%20MARGARET%20WHITE&sample_size=16).
